testCase.name: Checking the rendering of the HomeScreen A parent container should be rendered
Checking the rendering of the Item A container ListItem is rendered when Item is initialized
Checking the functionalities of the editable Item name Item name becomes editable when TouchableOpacity is pressed
Checking the functionalities of the editable Item name Pressed the checked Icon to save the Item name change
Checking the functionalities of the editable Item name Pressed the times Icon to drop the Title change
Checking the functionalities of the SplitButton If an item owned by one person, only a "All" btn is rendered
Checking the functionalities of the SplitButton If an item owned by more one person, "All" and "Split" are rendered
Checking the functionalities of the SplitButton Pressed on the ButtonGroup will change the data.split status
Checking the functionalities of the SplitButton Test round to 2 digits
Checking the functionalities of the SplitButton Press btn wont change the price of this item if num_owner == 1
Checking the functionalities of the SplitButton Press btn change the price of this item paid by a sharer if num_owner > 1
Checking the rendering of the Title A TouchableOpacity is rendered when Title is initialized
Checking the rendering of the Title Title text checking
Checking the functionalities of the Title Title renders a textInput when it is editable
Checking the functionalities of the Title Title becomes editable when TouchableOpacity is pressed
Checking the functionalities of the Title Pressed the checked Icon to save the Title change
Checking the functionalities of the Title Pressed the times Icon to drop the Title change
Checking the rendering of the modal A Modal should be rendered
LogIn Two input areas should be rendered
LogIn Button should be rendered
Checking the rendering of ReceiptList A divider should be rendered
Checking the rendering of ReceiptList If no history, a prompt should be rendered
Checking the rendering of ReceiptList If no history, a prompt should be rendered
Checking the functionaliies of ReceiptList When keyword.length == 0, no receiptItem would be rendred
Checking the rendering of ReceiptListItem A touchableOpacity should be rendered
Checking the rendering of ReceiptListItem When onwer is a sharer, item should be rendered in steelblue
